column2: model_rel2 <- lm(logGDP ~ Religiosity + EastEurope + MiddleEast + Asia + WestEurope + Americas, data = ReligionGDP)

lm(formula = logGDP ~ Religiosity + EastEurope + MiddleEast + 
    Asia + WestEurope + Americas, data = ReligionGDP)
# The coefficient of -0.9979 indicates that, after controlling for region, a one-unit increase in Religiosity is associated with a 0.9979 decrease in logGDP.

Model 1: logGDP ~ Religiosity
Model 2: logGDP ~ Religiosity + EastEurope + MiddleEast + Asia + WestEurope + 
    Americas
# It does help because the p-value 0.001448 is less than 0.05.
